plot: On the day when a fireworks display is planned, Norimichi, Yusuke, and their friends at school in a Japanese seaside town cannot agree whether or not fireworks are "flat" or "round" when ...
title: Uchiage hanabi, shita kara miruka? Yoko kara miruka?
